name: WhiteHouseHistoryGuide
0:
”Alexa, open White House History Guide.”
”Alexa, start White House History Guide”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: white house history guide
des: Have you ever wondered how the White House got its name? Or what the President’s job description is? Let Hoban, named after the original architect White House architect, James Hoban, be your White House History guide. Created by the White House Historical Association, this skill allows you to explore more than 200-years of history of the Executive Mansion. Hoban can tell you about the roles of the president and walk you through the spaces in the White House that support those roles. You can even test your knowledge with a multiple choice quiz! Hoban can tell you answers to many of the most frequently asked questions about the White House from how many rooms to when the mansion got electricity.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
